Title: Requires comprehensive coverage for treatment of obesity
Summary: Requires comprehensive coverage for treatment of obesity, including coverage for prevention and wellness, nutrition counseling, intensive behavioral therapy, bariatric surgery, and FDA-approved anti-obesity medication.
LawCode: Amd §365-a, Soc Serv L; amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring comprehensive coverage for treatment of obesity
